userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use

Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Archives. Please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu, (212) 998-2630.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: James Geoghegan was a member of the Utility Workers Union of America, Local 1-2 and served as Business Agent for the local between 1958 and 1960.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains papers related to Utility Workers of America, Local 1-2. Documents include a history of the employee relations at Con Edison, legal papers from Consolidated Edison Company of New York v. National Labor Relations Board (1937), a copy of the union's charter, and newspaper clippings.
